paragraphs: Found in the Hearthfire DLC. Italicized words are determined by the game.
<italic>[Jarl name], Jarl of [Capital city] to [Player name], [his/her] loyal friend; grant of the steading of Lakeview Manor on the south shore of Lake Ilinalta, east of Falkreath.</italic>
<italic>Witnessed by [Steward name], Steward to Jarl [Jarl name], [day] [month], [year]</italic>
